text: Larry Page was born in East Lansing, Michigan. He would go on to help invent and co-found Google.
Queen Elizabeth II sent the first royal email, from the Royal Signals and Radar Establishment in Malvern as a part of a demonstration of networking technology.

The "Melissa" worm showed up in a file on the alt.sex usenet group and became the first successful mass-mailing worm. The worm's creator, David L. Smith, apparently named the worm after a lap dancer in Florida.
